title: My Name is Zhao Wudi
overview: Female CEO Shen Xingyu chose to marry an ordinary security guard, Zhao Wudi, in order to keep the company she had devoted so much effort to. From confrontation to alliance, the two work together to defeat the dark forces behind the scenes. After experiencing various hardships, they get to know each other across status and status, develop sincere feelings, and understand the true meaning of marriage and love.
